creator: Ciwac Connected Accounts
descriptionHtml:
Ciwac is a cloud based accounting software to digitize the accounting workflows of small and medium sized businesses.

Ciwac helps businesses connect their ledger in real time for instant account reconciliation. Using Ciwac, a user can create a transaction and share it with their business partners in real time; who can then verify, edit or delete that transaction. They can add multimedia attachments such as (files, images) for future reference. Moreover businesses can
- Send Payment Reminder for pending payment.
- Set Ledger Limit to get notified when the other party exceeds that limit.
- Handle ledgers in multiple currency.
- Provide or Revoke Access to a team member for each ledger.
- Download the data in PDF or Excel by applying the desired Time Filters.

Through the C-Plus Section, users can handle their:
- Sales & Sales Return
- Purchase & Purchase Return
- Expenses
- Cash Books
- Bank Accounts

Inventory:
- Add different products in Business Stock
- Assign a unique reference number to each lot.
- Add or Remove from Each Stock Lot
- Get Real Time Updates on the value of Stock in Hand
- Generate Stock Reports for All Products and Reference number.

Salary:
- Create and Save all Employee Information
- Handle Employees with Fixed Salary, Part Time Work, Piece Rate Compensation and Commission.
- Mark their attendance and maintain daily logs for their activity, such as number of hours worked or pieces completed or sales made.
- Handle Advance Salary, Generate Pay Slips and Create Employee Ledgers.

Transaction Duplication:
Ciwac allows you to automatically duplicate a transaction in relevant account by simply choosing from a dropdown.

For example, you added a transaction for Sale. After the transaction is recorded in Sale, Ciwac will give you an option if this sale was for Credit (Ledger), Cash or Bank. If you chose Cash, it would also add that Sale Amount in your Cash book. This will instantly update your Sale, Cash Book, and Business Summary.

Ledger and Business Summary:

A dashboard for real time updates of your Business and Ledgers.

Accounting Settings:

Ciwac is an accounting platform that always put you and your business first. It does this by prioritizing the safety of your data. It allows your business to have:
1) Multiple User Accounts
2) Admin Control to provide or revoke access of a team member.
3) Transfer inactive team member account to a new team member seamlessly with all the existing data.
4) Back-up and download all your data in your devices.
5) If you lose your device, you can simply login to your Ciwac account to retieve all the data from the cloud.

descriptionShort: Ciwac is a cloud based accounting platform with connected ledgers
title: Ciwac- Connected Accounting

creator: Ciwac Connected Accounting Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Ciwac is a cloud based Accounting & Bookkeeping Software to digitize the accounting workflows of small and medium sized businesses.
Ciwac helps businesses connect their Accounts Payables and Accounts Receivables in real time for instant account reconciliation. Using Ciwac, a user can create a transaction and share it with their business partners in real time; who can then verify, edit or delete that transaction. They can add multimedia attachments such as (files, images) for future reference. Moreover businesses can
Send Payment Reminder for pending Accounts Receivable
Set Limit on Accounts Receivable to get notified when the other party exceeds that limit.
Handle Ledger Book in multiple currency.
Provide or Revoke Access to a team member for each Accounts Payable or Accounts Receivable.
Download the data in PDF or Excel by applying the desired Time Filters.

Through a slick Accounting and Bookkeeping Suite called C-Plus , users can handle their:
Sales & Sales Return in Sale Book
Purchase & Purchase Return in Purchase Book
Expenses in Expense Book
Cash in Cash Book
Bank Accounts in Bank Book

Inventory Management
Add different products in Business Stock
Assign a unique reference number to each lot
Add or Remove from Each Stock Lot
Get Real Time Updates on the value of Stock in Hand
Generate Stock Reports for All Products and Reference number.

Salary Book
Create and Save all Employee Information
Handle Employees with Fixed Salary, Part Time Work, Piece Rate Compensation and Commission.
Attendance management and record daily logs for their activity, such as number of hours worked or pieces completed or sales made.
Handle Advance Salary, Generate and Manage Payslips, Create Employee Ledgers

Ledger Transaction Duplication
Ciwac allows you to automatically duplicate a transaction in relevant account by simply choosing from a dropdown.

For example, you added a Sale Transaction in Sale Book. Ciwac will give you an option if this Sale was for Credit (Ledger), Cash or Bank. If you chose Cash, it would also add that Sale Amount in your Cash book. This will instantly update your Sale Book, Cash Book, and Business Summary.

Ledger and Business Account Summary:
A dashboard for real time updates of your Business Accounts and Ledger Book

Accounting Settings:
Ciwac is an accounting platform that always put you and your business first. It does this by prioritizing the safety of your data. It allows your business to have:
1) Multiple User Accounts
2) Admin Control to provide or revoke access of a team member.
3) Transfer inactive team member account to a new team member seamlessly with all the existing data.
4) Back-up and download all your data in your devices.
5) If you lose your device, you can simply login to your Ciwac account to retieve all the data from the cloud."

4) Back-up and download all your data in your devices.
5) If you lose your device, you can simply login to your Ciwac account to retieve all the data from the cloud."
descriptionShort: Ciwac is a cloud based Accounting platform with connected ledgers
title: Ciwac - Comptabilité connectée

creator: Ciwac Connected Accounting Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Ciwac is a cloud based Accounting & Bookkeeping Software to digitize the accounting workflows of small and medium sized businesses.
Ciwac helps businesses connect their Accounts Payables and Accounts Receivables in real time for instant account reconciliation. Using Ciwac, a user can create a transaction and share it with their business partners in real time; who can then verify, edit or delete that transaction. They can add multimedia attachments such as (files, images) for future reference. Moreover businesses can
Send Payment Reminder for pending Accounts Receivable
Set Limit on Accounts Receivable to get notified when the other party exceeds that limit.
Handle Ledger Book in multiple currency.
Provide or Revoke Access to a team member for each Accounts Payable or Accounts Receivable.
Download the data in PDF or Excel by applying the desired Time Filters.

Through a slick Accounting and Bookkeeping Suite called C-Plus , users can handle their:
Sales & Sales Return in Sale Book
Purchase & Purchase Return in Purchase Book
Expenses in Expense Book
Cash in Cash Book
Bank Accounts in Bank Book

Inventory Management
Add different products in Business Stock
Assign a unique reference number to each lot
Add or Remove from Each Stock Lot
Get Real Time Updates on the value of Stock in Hand
Generate Stock Reports for All Products and Reference number.

Salary Book
Create and Save all Employee Information
Handle Employees with Fixed Salary, Part Time Work, Piece Rate Compensation and Commission.
Attendance management and record daily logs for their activity, such as number of hours worked or pieces completed or sales made.
Handle Advance Salary, Generate and Manage Payslips, Create Employee Ledgers

Ledger Transaction Duplication
Ciwac allows you to automatically duplicate a transaction in relevant account by simply choosing from a dropdown.

For example, you added a Sale Transaction in Sale Book. Ciwac will give you an option if this Sale was for Credit (Ledger), Cash or Bank. If you chose Cash, it would also add that Sale Amount in your Cash book. This will instantly update your Sale Book, Cash Book, and Business Summary.

Ledger and Business Account Summary:
A dashboard for real time updates of your Business Accounts and Ledger Book

Accounting Settings:
Ciwac is an accounting platform that always put you and your business first. It does this by prioritizing the safety of your data. It allows your business to have:
1) Multiple User Accounts
2) Admin Control to provide or revoke access of a team member.
3) Transfer inactive team member account to a new team member seamlessly with all the existing data.
4) Back-up and download all your data in your devices.
5) If you lose your device, you can simply login to your Ciwac account to retieve all the data from the cloud."

Download the data in PDF or Excel by applying the desired Time Filters.
Invoice Book:
Create Invoice, Purchase Order, Quotations, Request for Quotation, Sales Return, Purchase Return and Delivery Note.
Through a slick Accounting and Bookkeeping Suite called C-Plus , users can handle their:
Sales & Sales Return in Sale Book
Purchase & Purchase Return in Purchase Book
Expenses in Expense Book
Cash in Cash Book
Bank Accounts in Bank Book

Inventory Management
Add different products in Business Stock
Assign a unique reference number to each lot
Add or Remove from Each Stock Lot
Get Real Time Updates on the value of Stock in Hand
Generate Stock Reports for All Products and Reference number.

Salary Book
Create and Save all Employee Information
Handle Employees with Fixed Salary, Part Time Work, Piece Rate Compensation and Commission.
Attendance management and record daily logs for their activity, such as number of hours worked or pieces completed or sales made.
Handle Advance Salary, Generate and Manage Payslips, Create Employee Ledgers

Ledger Transaction Duplication
Ciwac allows you to automatically duplicate a transaction in relevant account by simply choosing from a dropdown.

For example, you added a Sale Transaction in Sale Book. Ciwac will give you an option if this Sale was for Credit (Ledger), Cash or Bank. If you chose Cash, it would also add that Sale Amount in your Cash book. This will instantly update your Sale Book, Cash Book, and Business Summary.

Ledger and Business Account Summary:
A dashboard for real time updates of your Business Accounts and Ledger Book

Accounting Settings:
Ciwac is an accounting platform that always put you and your business first. It does this by prioritizing the safety of your data. It allows your business to have:
1) Multiple User Accounts
2) Admin Control to provide or revoke access of a team member.
3) Transfer inactive team member account to a new team member seamlessly with all the existing data.
4) Back-up and download all your data in your devices.
5) If you lose your device, you can simply login to your Ciwac account to retieve all the data from the cloud."

descriptionShort: Ciwac is a cloud based Accounting platform with connected ledgers
title: Ciwac - Połączona Księgowość

creator: Ciwac Connected Accounting Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Ciwac is a cloud-based Accounting and bookkeeping platform that digitizes the accounting workflows of micro and small businesses. By connecting in real-time, businesses can instantaneously reconcile their ledgers, collaborate on new orders, and share professional business documents on the go. Moreover, Ciwac provides a complete accounting and bookkeeping suite to manage daily operations. The platform is specifically designed for users with little or no understanding of accounting.

One of the biggest pain points in accounting is that sellers’ and buyers’ ledgers hardly reconcile over a period. For most small businesses, recording an entry entails writing a single line in a spreadsheet. Such transactions do not add the relevant required information. With Ciwac, users can enter a transaction with multimedia attachments (files, images, invoices, purchase orders, voice recordings, etc.).

Using Ciwac, a user can create a transaction and share it with their business partners in real-time; who can then verify, edit, or delete that transaction. This process ensures that the business partner is notified immediately and that they have the same outstanding balance. The dynamic and interactive ledgers also allow the users to:
• Send Payment Reminder
• Set a Limit on Accounts Receivable
• Provide or Revoke Access to a team member
• Download the data in PDF or Excel

C-Plus

With C-Plus, a user-friendly Accounting and Bookkeeping Suite, managing business finances has never been easier. Businesses can always stay on top of their Sales, Purchases, Expenses, Cash, and Bank. This power-packed section is integrated with other platform sections, such as Ledger, Market, Inventory, Invoice Book, and Salary Book.

Invoice Book:

Businesses can generate Invoices, Purchase Orders, Quotations, Requests for Quotation, Sales Returns, Purchase Returns, and Delivery Notes. They can insert electronic signatures and stamps on these documents.

Marketplace:

Ciwac introduces the world’s first marketplace that is directly connected with business accounts. It acts as an automated Order Book, that brings transparency to their orders. A Ciwac business can use this section to showcase their products and services to their business partners in real-time. After an order, both businesses can collaborate in real-time and generate contract-specific documents. Businesses can also automatically update their inventory levels.

Inventory Management:
Ciwac introduces the world’s first inventory management system that gives precise information. Instead of relying on inventory estimates, a business on Ciwac assigns a unique reference number to each stock lot of its products. After selecting the appropriate reference number for stock in and stock out, businesses can get precise information about their stock lots and products.

Salary Book:
Ciwac introduces the world’s first employee management system that is directly linked with business accounts. A business on Ciwac can:
• Record all Employee Information
• Handle Employees with varying compensation structures such as Fixed Salary, Part-Time work, piece rate, and Commission.
• Mark their attendance and record their daily logs such as hours worked, pieces completed, or sales made.
• Generate their Pay Slips and Performance Sheets.

Businesses on Ciwac get a real-time comprehensive overview of their entire business.

Ciwac is an accounting platform that puts your business first. It does this by prioritizing the safety of your data. Ciwac allows businesses to:
• Create multiple user accounts for team collaboration.
• Manage team members' permissions for each module through Admin Controls.
• Transfer Inactive accounts to a new team member with all the existing data.
• Create a backup by downloading all Ciwac data
• Deleting their account and data permanently.

Users can easily retrieve their data by logging into Ciwac on a new device, as all data is securely stored in the cloud.

Availability:
Web, Android, IOS, Software
descriptionShort: Ciwac is a cloud based Accounting platform with connected ledgers
title: Ciwac- Connected Accounting
